title: What are some really happy soft songs with touching lyrics? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ripple (Grateful Dead) Here Comes the Sun (Beatles) Such Great Heights (Iron & Wine) This Will Be our Year (Zombies) Blue Sky (Allman Bros, check out Elizabeth Mitchell cover) Days (Kinks, Kirsty MacColl) A bunch of Donovan sings A bunch of Hermans Hermits All I Do is Dream of You (Gene Austin) Kiss Me (Sixpence None the Richer) Bizarre Love Triangle (Frente!) Not Given Lightly (Chris Knox) Lovely Day (Bill Withers) Lovin’ You (Minnie Riperton) 59th Street Bridge Song Come Softly To Me (Fleetwoods) Bubbly (Connie Caillat) Neverending Song of Love After Hours (Velvet Underground) Shady Lane (Pavement) Some Daniel Johnson songs Itchykoo Park (Small Faces) Harvest Moon (Neil Young) New Soul (Yael Naïm) You're My Best Friend (Queen) Buzzin’ Fly (Tim Buckley)

Well, I’ll list some for you: Oh Ms Believer by Twenty One PilotsBusted and Blue by GorillazIllusion by VNV Nation (probably the best song on this list)any song by Death Cab for Cutie.The End of All Things by Panic! At The Disco.From Finner, Little Talks, and Your Bones by Of Monsters and MenGive My Love to Rose by Johnny CashAnd many other songs. Let me know if you want/need more.
